system.description: People of the sea, they are never very comfortable far from a large body of water. Corsairs are wanderers and like to be on the move. Corsairs tend to be humble in that they understand that nature is greater than they are and respect it for that. If you are an Corsair, crave water and sailing, go with the flow, keep on the move, and keep things ship shape.

overview.base: All @L[Category:Thrown equipment]{thrown} @L[Category:Weapons]{weapons} are @L[Property:AV0]{AV0} for you.
overview.proficient: The range of all @L[Category:Thrown equipment]{thrown} @L[Category:Weapons]{weapons} you use is doubled.
overview.fluent: Instead, the range of all @L[Category:Thrown equipment]{thrown} @L[Category:Weapons]{weapons} you use is tripled.

overview.base:
Wind Shuriken counts as a @L[Category:Weapons]{weapon} in the @L[Category:Daggers]{dagger weapon class}.
Note: Although Wind Shuriken does not deal @L[Damage:Magic]{magic damage}, it can be made to using @L[Ability:Might Strike]{Might Strike}.
Design Note: Should we rewrite this so that Wind Shuriken isn't something that people can @L[Ability:Avoid]{Avoid} or @L[Ability:Resist Effects]{easily Resist}?
overview.proficient: Instead, deal [[/damage 1d10]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage} to target.
overview.fluent: Instead, deal [[/damage 1d12]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage} to target.

results.hit: Deal [[/damage 1d8]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage} to target.
Target takes a @L[Damage:Hack]{body hack}.
results.critHit: If you want, target takes @L[Core:Damage]{standard damage} as well.

overview.base: You swim at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{full speed}.

Target gains one @L[Category:Standard abilities]{standard ability} you have, aren't @L[Keyword:Incapable]{incapable} of, and are @L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{proficient} in. You may only have this active on one creature at a time.

system.endCondition: You use Skill Share again.
